releaseNotes:
- Upgrade Music Party features and enhance Library UI.

 Team Netra

changelog.text: Added seek slider to Party Room player for synchronized playback control
Enabled authorized guests to add songs directly to the queue
Added badge notification for pending control requests on Host screen
Added visual indicator for existing songs in Party search results
Fixed playback interruption bug when switching songs in Party queue

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
